response.original_title: Danskernes egen historie - Bacon, br√∏d og bajere
response.overview: "Bacon, Bread and Bajere" is a captivating insight into how small craft companies develop into efficient industrial companies over the centuries. Here are films from the small master baker, who over the years creates a modern bread factory, from the Wool Jutlanders who started a textile industry, and from other small businesses that, through generations, turned into well-functioning industries within food, clothing and other necessities.
response.title: Bacon, Bread and Bajere
